:: 8 ::
Declaration
This declaration is to inform that in the course of preparing this document, we have brought all the necessary documents such as the property details in the document, the land title deeds, copies of the land deeds, link documents, tax receipts for the places/houses, details of the parties in the link document, addresses of the parties, photos of the parties, property details, etc., and we have thoroughly examined all the aspects and included them in this document and have prepared the document. No matter that should be written or included has been omitted in this document. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the document has been drawn up.
We are fully responsible for the depreciation stamp and all other matters found in the said document by the authorities (Registration & Stamps and Revenue Department) during their inspection in the future. Neither the Sub-Registrar nor the writer of the document has any connection with them.
If it is found in the future that this Scheduled Property is not a Government, Endowment, Wolf Board and Assignee, we are fully responsible for all such matters.
This is a declaration that we have read / read this document completely and have given our full consent.
Written by:
Sheikh Mastan Walih
Signed by:
SKE550
Date: 28-01-2026,
Piduguralla.

Details :– You are my brother. Out of my love for you, I wish to give you some immovable property in return for your love, and I have decided to transfer to you the 140 square yards of vacant land that I inherited from my ancestors, registered in my name as a house at Door No. 18- 146/152/1, Assessment No. 1132013375, registered in the office of the Municipality of Piduguralla, and which has been in my possession since that date and I alone have the right to donate, transfer, exchange, sell, and enjoy the right of possession, as per the schedule below, for a sum of Rs. I hereby settle and transfer to you, free of charge, the immovable property worth Rs. 19,64,000/- (Nineteen Lakh Sixty Four Thousand Rupees in words). Sheet Endorsement drawn by Sheikh Mastan

From today onwards, you, your heirs, The property shall be freely enjoyed by the son, grandson and descendants with all rights of exchange and sale. Neither you nor your heirs nor I nor my heirs shall be able to make any disputes, obstacles or claims against you who are enjoying it in this way. I hereby declare that this settlement property is free from any encumbrances, encumbrances, bank loans, court seizures, unbinding gifts, and any kind of sales contracts, etc., not given in writing to anyone, and I hereby declare it to be indisputable and settled in your name. I agree to settle all the disputes, encumbrances and claims against this settlement property at my own expense and to keep this settlement property for you. :: 4 ::
Schedule :- Palnadu District, Narasaraopet Registration District, Piduguralla Ys. R.O. As,
I hereby transfer to you the land registered in the village of Piduguralla, D.No. 855/47, bearing Dor No. 18-146/152/1, of the Municipality of Piduguralla, and having the right to do so,
140 square yards or 117.6 square meters of vacant land, in which a 1036 square feet R.C.C. roofed logili, constructed approximately 3 years ago, is situated.
East:- This direction is Sheikh Bibijan logili.
South:- This direction is the market.
West:- This direction is the market.
North:- This direction is the Dudekula Subhani logili.
I hereby grant you the lease of the 140 sq. yards or 117.6 sq. meters of land within these boundaries, including a 1036 sq. ft. R.C 927 of 2026 of Book-1 and assigned the
Identification number 1 - 727-927 - 2026 for Scanning on 28-JAN-26.

STRAR: : 6 : :
1. This property is not assigned by the Government. And the Endowment Department does not belong to them either.
2. This property does not belong to the Government or to any of its affiliated institutions. The above companies have not been mortgaged any securities.
3. We declare that the property to be transferred by this deed does not include any buildings, mango, coconut trees or plantations, mines of precious minerals, granite etc., missionary, fish pond or any other property and that if any facts are found to have been concealed in this deed, we agree to pay the duty of depreciation to prosecute us under sections 27 and 67 of the Indian Stamp Act.
4. I/we/my/our agents have not made any alienation of the Scheduled Property.
5. I hereby certify that the survey number, door number, measurements and details given in this document are correct. In case of any discrepancy, I will be held fully responsible for the strict action taken by the Registration Department in case of payment of less than the stamp duty as per the Indian Stamp Act, Andhra Pradesh Amendment Act No. 16/2002. 6. We hereby declare that we have duly stated in the said deed the full facts relating to the levy of stamp duty, the consideration, the market value of the property and the stamp duty payable on the deed under section 27 of the Indian Stamp Act, 1899 and that in case we fail to act as mentioned in section 27 above, we shall be liable to be prosecuted under section 70 for the recovery of the said amount by imposing penalty and regular payment of stamp duty from us. We have duly stated in the deed all the particulars, boundaries, full address etc. necessary for the identification of the property under section 21 of the Indian Registration Act, 1908. I/We/Our agents do hereby declare under Section 22(b) of the Registration Act that no alienation of any kind has been made in the said Scheduled Property. The stamp duty, fee and user charge in respect of this deed have been paid at the State Bank of Piduguralla. 7. Having heard all the above matters in full in the presence of the following witnesses, we hereby confirm that all these are as stated and written by us and that the scribe has written all that we have said. reportJson.addressLine: D.No. 18-146/152/1, Lenin Nagar, Piduguralla Town & Municipality, Palnadu District, Andhra Pradesh

requiredDocuments.docNumber: Property Tax receipt vide No. 04/2023-24/59(211320170000744) issued by Piduguralla Municipality in the name of Shaik Mastan Vali towards the House no. 18-146/152/1.
Property Tax receipt vide No. 04/2024- 25/59(211320170000744) issued by Piduguralla Municipality in the name of Shaik Mastan Vali towards the House no. 18-146/152/1.
Gift Settlement Deed executed by Shaik Mastan Vali in favour of his brother Shaik Jan Vali through vide document No.  927 of 2026
Encumbrance Certificate issued towards the schedule property vide Statement No. 139847073

sections.content: As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in Survey No. 855/47, bearing house no. 18-146/152/1, Assessment No. 1132013375, situated in Piduguralla, measuring about 140 Sq. Yds., was originally owned by Shaik Mastanvali, who acquired the property through inheritance from his ancestors. [Ref: Deed] 2. The aforementioned Shaik Mastanvali executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 28/Jan/2026, registered as document No. 927 of 2026, before the SRO Piduguralla, in favour of his Brother, Shaik Janvali towards the property measuring 140 Sq. Yds., Comprised in Survey No. 855/47, bearing house no. 18-146/152/1, Assessment No. 1132013375, situated in Piduguralla. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1. The Property Tax Receipt No. 04/2023-24/59(211320170000744), dated 31/Mar/2023, imprinted by the Piduguralla Municipality discloses that Shaik Mastan Vali has paid property tax for the period 01/Apr/2020 to 31/Mar/2023, towards house number 18-146/152/1. 2. The Property Tax Receipt No. 04/2024-25/59(211320170000744), dated 30/Mar/2024, imprinted by the Piduguralla Municipality discloses that Shaik Mastanvali has paid property tax for the period 01/Apr/2021 to 31/Mar/2024 towards house number 18-146/152/1. Note: It is advisable to verify that the tax is paid up-to-date towards the schedule property. 2. Encumbrance Certificate vide Statement No. 139847073, dated 29/Jan/2026, extracted with respect to the Schedule Property does not reflect any adverse entries, other than those mentioned above.

contentList: In case of Take Over/Balance Transfer from any other Banks/Financial Institutions the List of Documents (LOD) is provided for the above documents * NA
Whether title deed of present owner is properly stamped and registered as required under the law? Please provide the details of title deed. * Yes/Gift Settlement Deed
Whether the property/ies has/have been mutated in the name/s of the present owner? Please mention the name of document by which it is ascertain and If not mutated/recorded what remedy? * No
Whether there is any discrepancy in the mutation details and title deed? Please provide(if yes) * No

Whether requisites Sanctions/ Permissions/ Noc’s/ Plans/ Lay-outs from Competent Authorities under the State/ Central/ Local Laws have been obtained in order to develop/ construction of the property by the Owner/ Developer? Please mention details and If not obtained what remedy? * Unable to determine from given documents

Certificate of Commencement/ Occupation/ Completion/ Possession Receipt have been obtained from competent authorities. Please mentioned details. Whether RERA registration is obtained for the property and details are verified/matched with online portal of RERA. Please mention RERA details (If applicable) * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether permission for conversion of land/plot from Agricultural to Non-Agriculture for Residential/Commercial purpose or other purpose is obtained? Please mention the reference of the same. * Unable to determine from given documents
Whether up to date Property Tax/ Land Revenue Cess is paid to Municipal Corporation/ Panchayat/ Society and other State/Central Govt. Authorities. * Unable to determine from given documents
Whether the property tax receipts have been physically verified and found to be in the name of present owner. If not mutated in the present owner name what remedy? * No

Whether any of the minor is having interest in the Property offered as mortgage. If so, whether court permission has been obtained for offering the property as security or is yet to be obtained. If not, whether mortgage can be created on the property/ies offered as security. * No
Any Government Claims, Acquisitions, Third Party Claims, Liens etc. and details thereof. * No
Description * Details

Whether the property is affected by any Local Laws, ULC Law, Tenancy Law, Development Plan, State/Central Laws or other regulations. Whether subject property is falls under prohibitory list/ negative list in the records of the Local/State/Central Govt. or not. If Yes, please share details of the same and what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * No, as per given documents
Whether Permission or NOC from Developer/ Co-operative Housing Society/ State/ Central/ Local Authority or any other person or entity etc. are required before creation of mortgage. * No
Whether Lease Deed has been stamped and registered as required under the law. Please provide details. * NA
Residual period of Lease. * NA
Whether Lessee is permitted to mortgage the Leasehold Right?  * NA
Whether the consent/permission from the Lessor is required for creating the mortgage or not? * NA
Whether premium, lease rent and other dues have been paid to the Lessor by the Lessee up to date or not? Please mention details thereof. * NA
Any other detrimental clause in the lease-deed? * No
Whether the property belongs to any trust or is subject to the rights of any trust? * No
Whether the trust is a private or public trust? * NA

Whether trust deed specifically authorizes the mortgage of the property and trust is having borrowing power to borrower a loan from bank or financial institution for the purpose of trust under trust deed. Please specify the details. * NA
If Yes, additional precautions/permissions to be obtained for creation of valid mortgage? * NA
Any other precautions to be taken before creation of mortgage * No
Whether searches had been conducted at the concerned office at the Sub-Registrar of Assurance for the past 13 years. Please annex the search receipts and search report in respect thereof. * No
Particulars of all registered title deeds offered as security appears in the records of concerned Sub-Registrar of Assurance. * Yes
Whether any charge, encumbrances, defect or adverse entry are found which affect the title of the present owners. * No
Whether online/computer records are available or not and any verification or cross checking are made and the comments/ findings in this regard. * Yes
The period covered under the Encumbrance Certificate (EC) and the encumbrances if any, reflected therein. * 42 Years

Whether any subsisting charge on the property/ies offered as security is found in the search of CERSAI or ROC? If yes, state details of charge and whether the charge has been discharged or not. * Unable to determine from given documents

Whether there any subsisting charge on the property/ies offered as security? If yes, state whether such charge has been discharged or not. (Mortgage/ Lis-pendens/ Charge/ Encumbrances/ Attachment/ others) * No, as verified from EC
In case of missing/absence of any original title deeds of the property what precaution to be taken by the Incred Financial Services Limited in this regard. * NA

Whether the Incred Financial Services Limited will be able to enforce SARFAESI Act, if required against the property offered as security. * Yes, subject to the provisions of the Act, Physical verification of the property, and the quantum of the loan.
Whether the local laws or any other law restricts the creation of the Mortgage/ Sale of the property to be mortgaged to the Incred Financial Services Limited. * No
Type of Mortgage recommended for the Property (Equitable Mortgage/ Registered Mortgage) * As applicable

Applicable Stamp duty payable for mortgage at the respective state where the property is located - For Simple (Registered) Mortgage. For Deposit of Title Deed i.e. Equitable Mortgage/Memorandum of Deposit of Title Deed (EM/MOE/MODTD). Act and Article Number. Registration Charges for Equitable Mortgage/ Registered Mortgage in the respective state * Out of the scope
Whether Equitable Mortgage is compulsorily required to be registered or same is to be intimated to concerned Registrar or Sub-Registrar of Assurance or any other authority. * As applicable
Additional suggestions, if any to safeguard the interest of Incred Financial Services Limited/ ensuring the perfection of security. * No
Whether lawyer has verified all original title deeds and documents in respect to the property. * No

Whether the property is involved in or subject matter of any litigation which is pending or concluded? If so, whether such litigation would adversely affect the creation of a valid mortgage or have any implication of its future enforcement? * No, as per given documents

sections.content: In view of the aforesaid documents and information furnished before me/us, I/We hereby certify/opinion that Shaik Jan Vali is the absolute owners of the aforesaid schedule property and have an absolute, clear and marketable title over the schedule property and mortgage if created will be perfect and available to the Incred Financial Services Limited towards the liabilities of the Borrower.

sections.content: Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
